item.title: [PI] The basics - A list of tutorials by me
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:31, topic:476798”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=594961.msg4355245#msg4355245 date=1377404432]

Of course all the Tutorial Authors are in here spamming the thread and commenting on how useless it is.

Just following the rule from 2008 . :rolleyes:

Don’t know what you’re referring to. Don’t spam someone else’s thread just because you think you’re better than them. You have a Tutorial Author badge and that, to me, means absolutely nothing in terms of intelligence and I have no respect for you. Let’s keep it simple; don’t spam other people’s threads with an elitist mindset because you have no right to.

Truth be told, I didn’t have tutorial author at the time I posted in this. So the argument about ‘badge-pride’ is neutralized from that fact. I feel no different from anyone anyways, its assumptions from others. This is a full 3 months before I even got it, so I didn’t even know anything close about it. :o
[/quote]

I was referring to these posts, so yes, you did have the badge:

i got a multi portal but how do i change the coards? the only thing i did saw atm is the option to change the names
how do i change the coards for the teleports??

atm i only got this
case 2466: //portal multi
c.getDH().sendOption5(“coming soon1”, “coming soon2”, “coming soon3”, “Duel Arena”, “coming soon4”);
c.portalTwo = 1;
break;

someone bring my tutorial back… this is ridiculous…

<3d urs
[/quote][/quote]
Oh.

[quote=“arham 4, post:19, topic:476798”][quote author=topless link=topic=594961.msg4347948#msg4347948 date=1376179021]
i got a multi portal but how do i change the coards? the only thing i did saw atm is the option to change the names
how do i change the coards for the teleports??

atm i only got this
case 2466: //portal multi
c.getDH().sendOption5(“coming soon1”, “coming soon2”, “coming soon3”, “Duel Arena”, “coming soon4”);
c.portalTwo = 1;
break;

[/quote]
Gotta admit being rude. But I’ve had a 100% attitude change (ask l&P for proof :P), so thats how I act, not from the badge.

[quote=“arham 4, post:21, topic:476798”][quote author=Vain_ link=topic=594961.msg4348073#msg4348073 date=1376196605]
someone bring my tutorial back… this is ridiculous…
[/quote]
<3d urs[/quote]
How does this show any sign of me acting as if I am similiar.

But I don’t wanna start an argument with you (I"ve known you for a while and I like you), so lets just let this be.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] The basics - A list of tutorials by me
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:30, topic:476798”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=594961.msg4355002#msg4355002 date=1377358884]

Of course all the Tutorial Authors are in here spamming the thread and commenting on how useless it is.

Just following the rule from 2008 . :rolleyes:

Don’t know what you’re referring to. Don’t spam someone else’s thread just because you think you’re better than them. You have a Tutorial Author badge and that, to me, means absolutely nothing in terms of intelligence and I have no respect for you. Let’s keep it simple; don’t spam other people’s threads with an elitist mindset because you have no right to.
[/quote]
Truth be told, I didn’t have tutorial author at the time I posted in this. So the argument about ‘badge-pride’ is neutralized from that fact. I feel no different from anyone anyways, its assumptions from others. This is a full 3 months before I even got it, so I didn’t even know anything close about it. :o[/quote]

I was referring to these posts, so yes, you did have the badge:

[quote=“arham 4, post:19, topic:476798”][quote author=topless link=topic=594961.msg4347948#msg4347948 date=1376179021]
i got a multi portal but how do i change the coards? the only thing i did saw atm is the option to change the names
how do i change the coards for the teleports??

atm i only got this
case 2466: //portal multi
c.getDH().sendOption5(“coming soon1”, “coming soon2”, “coming soon3”, “Duel Arena”, “coming soon4”);
c.portalTwo = 1;
break;
[/quote]

[/quote]

[quote=“arham 4, post:21, topic:476798”][quote author=Vain_ link=topic=594961.msg4348073#msg4348073 date=1376196605]
someone bring my tutorial back… this is ridiculous…
[/quote]
<3d urs[/quote]

Read full topic
